snippet: Eulogies of Alex Ferguson and his career at Manchester United have been plentiful, yet many agree that his greatest achievement came elsewhere and a whole generation before his retirement.
abstract: Eulogies of Alex Ferguson and his career at Manchester United have been plentiful, yet many agree that his greatest achievement came elsewhere and a whole generation before his retirement.

headline.main: In Age Before Fergie Time, a Manager's Finest Hour and a Half
